title: [A Quiet Garden]
description: Two young yew trees stretch their wiry, twisted limbs toward the sky, their thick, needled boughs casting tranquil shadows across the courtyard.  A faint chill hangs in the air here, and the surroundings appear oddly still, not a single sound of anything living breaking the silence of the garden.  A low-set grey granite building is built between the twin yew trees, its mute and solemn architecture broken only by the large arch allowing entry.

Two young yew trees stretch their wiry, twisted limbs toward the sky, their thick, needled boughs illuminated wanly in the moonlight.  A faint chill hangs in the air here, and the surroundings appear oddly still, not a single sound of anything living breaking the silence of the garden.  A low-set grey granite building is built between the twin yew trees, its mute and solemn architecture broken only by the large arch allowing entry.
